summary: THE DOOR AJAR LIGHT KEEPS SAYING THE DOOR IN MY 2013 FORD EDGE (WITH LESS THAN 35,000 MILES) IS OPEN WHEN IN FACT IT IS CLOSED. IT WILL POP ON WHILE I AM DRIVING, SOUNDING AN ALERT AND TURNING ON THE INTERIOR LIGHTS. (WHICH IS ENOUGH TO SCARE THE HECK OUT OF YOU) OTHER TIMES, WHEN I GET IN OR OUT OF THE DOOR IT WILL JUST STAY ON. THIS LEAVES THE INTERIOR LIGHTS ON DRAINING THE BATTERY TO DEAD.SO AS OF LATELY, I HAVE BEEN GETTING IN AND OUT THROUGH THE PASSENGER SIDE DOOR.
